titleStmt.title: A report and discourse written by Roger Ascham, of the affaires and state of Germany and the Emperour Charles his court, duryng certaine yeares while the sayd Roger was there
titleStmt.author: Ascham, Roger, 1515-1568.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Daye, dwelling ouer Aldersgate,

notesStmt.note: At the foot of title: Cum gratia & priuilegio Regiæ Maiestatis, per decennium.
Running title reads: A discours and affaires of the state of Germanie.
Bodleian Library copy identified as STC 831 on UMI microfilm reel 167.
Reproductions of the originals in the Bodleian Library and the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
